channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Sign highlighting Junction ahead, 15th August
item.description:
The triangular sign highlighting the junction of branch Road has been knocked down however it is also in poor repair so needs replacing. This junction regularly has near misses with people turning out and traffic going to fast around the slight bend. If anything can be done to improve the visibility or signage to make it safer - that would be great Sign has been down for 2 days

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Road, The Reddings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign structurally damaged/leaning more than 20 degrees/loose in ground (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Suspected illegal road works signage being used, 15th August
item.description:
Boverton drive, outside number 34. There are no known roadworks or works listed on public sights that would align with this works. The signage has not been weighed down with sandbags. I believe this is being used to reserve parking spaces illegally.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, Westfield Avenue, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, 15th August
item.description:
After recent grass cutting on the Golden Valley this has shredded all the litter up and now looks a mess and its blowing around everywhere a litter pick is desperately required in this area mainly on Golden Valley to Elmbridge Court but also up to Innsworth roundabout to.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water leakage on road for past few days- burst water main?, 14th August
item.description:
Water running down the west side of road and spreading from top of hill on New Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped vegetation and garden waste on highway, 14th August
item.description:
Wellington Lane North, outside Rosehill. Next to fire hydrant sign and opposite garages. Dumped garden cuttings of trees and grass and a pile of earth. There is also a lot of overhanging vegetation obstructing the highway and the end of the lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Clyde Crescent, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Smashed glass, 14th August
item.description:
There’s smashed glass around the basketball court, I picked up as much as I could by hand but there’s a lot there, some in the edges of the grass too Mostly on the left hand side of the court if you look At it from The carpark There’s also rubbish in the long grass near the court, I picked up 20 odd plastic bottles, not sure why they’ve left them as the bin wasn’t full, maybe they need a sign saying please put your rubbish in the bin with an arrow on to the bin

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Lane, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
